org.semanticweb.rulewerk.core.model.implementation

Class Serializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.rulewerk.core.model.implementation.Serializer

  • public class Serializer
extends Object
    Objects of this class are used to create string representations of syntactic objects.
    Author:
    Markus Kroetzsch
    See Also:
    RuleWerk rule syntax

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Serializer.SerializationWriter
      Interface for a method that writes something to a writer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Function<String,String> identityIriSerializer
      Default IRI serializer that can be used if no abbreviations (prefixes, base, etc.) are used.
      static String STATEMENT_END 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Serializer(Writer writer)
      Construct a serializer that serializes IRIs without any form of transformation or abbreviation.
      Serializer(Writer writer, Function<String,String> iriTransformer)
      Construct a serializer that uses a specific function to serialize IRIs.
      Serializer(Writer writer, PrefixDeclarationRegistry prefixDeclarationRegistry)
      Construct a serializer that uses the given PrefixDeclarationRegistry to abbreviate IRIs.

      Writes a serialization of the given DatatypeConstant without using any Turtle-style abbreviations for common datatypes like string and int.

      • identityIriSerializer

        public static final Function<String,String> identityIriSerializer
        Default IRI serializer that can be used if no abbreviations (prefixes, base, etc.) are used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Serializer

        public Serializer(Writer writer,
                  Function<String,String> iriTransformer)
        Construct a serializer that uses a specific function to serialize IRIs.
        Parameters:
        writer - the object used to write serializations
        iriTransformer - a function used to abbreviate IRIs, e.g., if namespace prefixes were declared

      • Serializer

        public Serializer(Writer writer)
        Construct a serializer that serializes IRIs without any form of transformation or abbreviation.
        Parameters:
        writer - the object used to write serializations

      • Serializer

        public Serializer(Writer writer,
                  PrefixDeclarationRegistry prefixDeclarationRegistry)
        Construct a serializer that uses the given PrefixDeclarationRegistry to abbreviate IRIs.
        Parameters:
        writer - the object used to write serializations
        prefixDeclarationRegistry - the object used to abbreviate IRIs
